aboutMe: My name is Sihlandlo Makhumsha and I am a student at Life  Choices Coding Academy.  I was born in Cape Town, 4 years later moved to stay in the  rurals of the Eastern Cape with my grandmother who played a significant role in my life. I started my grade R there in 2007 then went to finish matric in 2019 then somehow after highschool I came back to the Western Cape.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: Instructed to create a calculator to showcase JavaScript  know-how.
